text:
Hi there Michael,

Great to meet you.
Feel free to ask any questions which I might be able to help with.

Hard to say how long I've been mentoring for, as I just sort of drifted into doing it...

I still mentor students from my first games class in Australia from 12 years ago, and quite a few others since then.
Some are now art directors, senior animators or character effects artists.
This is my first time mentoring through accessVFX.
